articles.author: Akash Sriram, Stephen Nellis
articles.title: Apple escalates Epic Games feud by blocking Fortnite app in EU - Fox Business
articles.description: Apple escalated its feud with Epic Games on Wednesday, blocking the Fortnite video-game maker from launching its own online marketplace on iPhones and iPads in Europe.

articles.author: Tim Hardwick
articles.title: Alternative iOS App Stores Only Work for 'Grace Period' When Traveling Outside of EU - MacRumors
articles.description: With the release of iOS 17.4, iPhone users in the European Union can access third-party app stores, but Apple warns that EU users traveling outside...
articles.content: With the release of iOS 17.4, iPhone users in the European Union can access third-party app stores, but Apple warns that EU users traveling outside of the bloc will only have a "grace period" before … [+2309 chars]

articles.author: Prerna Mittra
articles.title: Five Dead In Europe In 'Parrot Fever’ Outbreak: Everything To Know About The Disease | TheHealthSite. - TheHealthSite
articles.description: To prevent this illness one must follow good precautions when handling and cleaning birds and cages. It should be noted that an infected bird may not always seem sick but it can shed the bacteria when it breathes or poops. TheHealthSite.com
articles.content: Disease transmission to humans occurs mainly through inhalation of airborne particles from respiratory secretions, dried feces, or feather dust. Direct contact with birds is not required for infectio… [+3938 chars]
